function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to interconnectedness and interdependencies of everyday life.","High levels of anxiety and fear related to covid-19","Increased reliance on healthcare professionals for covid-19 information may lead to greater trust in the information but could result in decreased public interest in pandemic news.","Exposure to contagious coronaviruses in aerosols","Risk of viral integration in human lung host cells","High transmission potential of coronaviruses","Potential spread of contagious diseases through wearable technology","The indoor spread of covid-19 due to reduced outdoor ventilation and increased social interactions in cooler weather.","Spread of covid-19 via droplet, contact, and airborne routes in indoor environments.","Inadequate ventilation provision due to tightly constructed buildings and space restrictions.","Transmission of respiratory infections via droplet, contact, and airborne routes","Inadequate investigation of droplets and aerosols produced by expiratory events such as coughing and sneezing.","Survival of sars-cov-2 on surfaces","Ineffective use of face masks and coverings leading to increased transmission of covid-19","Inadequate ventilation leading to high airborne infection risk","Increased secondary infection numbers during colder winter months.","Centralized recirculation systems not effective at filtering out viral material","Limited supply of clean air in spaces due to filter effectiveness and flow rate."]}
